EnglishExamples: Oysters are definitely an acquired taste.
SpanishExamples: Las ostras definitivamente son un gusto adquirido.

EnglishExamples: There is hardly anything to eat in this house.
SpanishExamples: No hay casi nada de comer en esta casa

EnglishExamples: The last five kilometers was a nerve-wracking time as we passed through an ambush zone.
SpanishExamples: Los 5 últimos kilómetros fueron un momento estreante ya que pasamos por una emboscada

EnglishExamples: I'm feeling slightly tired after the walk.
He touched her slightly to get her attention.
SpanishExamples: Me siento algo cansado despues de andar.
La tocó suavemente para llamar su atención.
